name: Beef Grill
description:
Let's experience to grill beef from this game !!
Yakiniku or Grilled Beef has been known as one of popular dish in Japan where customer can really taste the good quality beef.

The purpose of this game is how fast you can eat perfect beef in two minute.

Game objective
- Pick the beef from dish to oven for grill
- Change beef side on oven when complete grill beef
- Bring the beef to sauce bowl for eat it
- If the beef over cooking you can throw it to the bin

Enjoy the game !
